(High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [Symlink Attack] Can an attacker create a symbolic link at delta_path pointing to sensitive files (e.g., validator keys, consensus state), causing save_delta to overwrite critical data when called? [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [Denial of Service] Can an attacker provide a delta HashMap with millions of StateKey entries, causing std::fs::write to consume excessive disk space and crash validator nodes or simulation infrastructure? [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/delta.rs] [Function: save_delta()] [Permission Escalation] If save_delta runs with elevated privileges, can an attacker exploit it to create files in restricted directories or modify permissions of existing files? (High)
